string.text: A couple of helicopters have just passed me. Coordinates enclosed. Stay safe. I don't know what their orders are.
We're continuing on the same bearing from the downed helicopter in the marshes. Nothing so far.\nShit, it's Duty!\nGo to the private channel, quickly!
Waves of mutants coming from the northwest. See attached coordinates.
Waves of mutants, coming from the northern valley.
Waves of mutants heading east, presumably from the Dark Valley.
Mayday... A pack of dogs is coming straight for us. Exact coordinates given. Please help!
If it's not mutants, it's bandits...\nPotap:\nYes, we can guess...
Just been rushed by a Pseudodog. Barely shot it in time!\nPotap:\nWell done...
Mayday... A battle has broken out at the Agricultural Industry in the central complex!
Duty:\n Anyone doing the same as in here, be warned - you WILL be raided...
Lukash, the Merc's been shot. On my way back.\nFreedom\nSwitch to the private channel, assholes!
Two, Three, Seven, return to base and consolidate.
Marauders! We're being attacked! Help!\nNo one can help unless you attach your coordinates, idiot...

We need access to the Internet. Should we make our way to the bar, where it's crowded, or go further to Sidorovich where it's more private?\nPotap:\nYes, the Bar will always be busy, but you can try the signallers at Duty. They also have access
Has anyone figured out where those ALD weapons are?\nIt's probably a trap anyway...
Crap...\n Just stepped in the biggest pile of boar shit ever!
Where the hell am I?\nWhy is it so foggy out here?...
I'm lost! I need help...\n Is anybody receiving this?\n Anybody...?
So that explains it, but I don't know where the signal is coming from...
In the Swamps, a Stalker named Kalmyak sells medical ointment. It really helps! Almost all my symptoms have gone. Much better than vodka!
I'm going to try using emoticons more often :) ;) 8)... Communication scrambled...\nPotap:\n Idiot blocked
A huge beast has turned up in the swamps. It's strong, and almost two metres tall. The Bandits near the church are covered in blood, and it's still alive... I gave them a bandage to share
Just come from the Reconnoitred Earth. Saw the lake, nearby which was an Electric Chimera, grazing. I do NOT advise going there...
Attention, all fighters! Bandits are trying to take over the ATP! This is our territory! Help us defend it!
\n A group of five people are moving towards the Barrier. Looks like the Monolith. Take immediate action.
Barrier:\n Understood. Those fucking lunatics!
Warning: In a small village in the Dark Valley, if you're offered a Gauss rifle for 800 roubles - don't believe it. It's a scam!
What the hell? Just when you think everything's quietened down for the night, at 21.00 a shitload of fucking green-eyed zombies appear! I've heard of it, but never seen it happen here before!
I've just heard that in the Red Forest there's a huge catfish living in the river. That would look great on the wall...
You're not going to believe this, but a dead dog has just fallen out of the sky right next to me...
I've heard that an average of twenty people die each day in the Zone. I'm still here, but I see fewer and fewer people each day. My time must come soon...
The client has accepted our price, and given us the details. Now we have a job to do...
I heard you know about some lab - X-16? X-18? X-20? Tell me what you know, or you're dead...
I heard that at the bar there's one guy, an informant. He sells transmutation Recipes for artefacts. Check it out...
Fuck! It's impossible to get through Pripyat, what with those bastard helicopters shooting the shit out of anything that moves...!
On the way to Limansk, I arrived at a construction site full of Monolith! Gettin' outa here quick before I'm seen!
I drank some shit vodka. This is the second day I've been sat on a toilet, throwing up in a bucket...
Nobody knows who the shooter is? One group is was very interested in finding out. They're offering a large reward
There's a Snork here still alive after taking both barrels in the head. That's one tough mofo!
Looks like the bastard offspring of two different mutants is living in the woods here
Just killed a Chimera, but there's usually two in a nest
Just saw a withered corpse, totally sucked dry. Indicates a den of Bloodsuckers close by
Looking for a technician, preferably with experience of night vision devices. Dust-free working environment. Decent pay
Found an exoskeleton in the ATP. Put in on and used it for ages, until I fell into a Springboard. Now, it's up in space somewhere...
For Sale - Old exoskeleton. Sealing system is damaged, but otherwise in excellent condition
Just fended off a major wave of mutants. Awaiting another one soon. Anyone who can help, come quickly
The Duty warehouse has just received a batch of brand new FN-2000's. You need to get there quickly if you want to ste..., sorry, buy one
Damn! The area around Yantar is full of zombies again! Neat job you did there, people!\nPotap:\nCarry on with the mission. We still need that information...
Speak with the Bandits. They should know how to get through that area quietly...
Attention all Stalkers who wish to clear their debts - go to a private channel for information on the upcoming mutant raid and other operations.
Went to Darkscape looking for Tweed\nGot chased out by a group of soldiers. No idea who they were...
Is anybody out there?\nI need assistance. Anybody?\nWhere the hell am I?...
FSS?\nWho the hell is that, anyway? Probably some jerk looking to cause trouble, no doubt!
I had it!\nIt was awesome... but I lost it...\nIt just flew right outta my hand, and disappeared... Can't find it... Gotta find it, though...
Did you hear about F1?\nEveryone's dead. It's far too hot to enter, and there are no clues as to what happened!
Let's meet at the bar up north. Don't forget vodka for the guards at the gate.
Just tried to go to the old research station.\nWatch out - there's something definitely something wrong with that place. And extremely hostile!
Top end military goods!\nAt the Black Market, for the next few days only
Almost had it back!\nOn the rooftops, near the generators. But then it sliced up some Monolith bastards and disappeared again!
Hey, did you hear?\nThe Duty commander in Rostok has lost his marbles. He actually sent out a team out to find a panda bear for him to take back to Moscow...
Watch out at the Dead Marshes.\nOur whole village has been overrun by group of military assholes!
Need a Stalker, preferably discreet for some... delicate work. Do not respond directly, but to the base
Work available, to search for equipment. Payment per item found. Look for me in the Reconnoitered Earth, in the infirmary
Looking for experienced Stalkers to raid for artefacts. Contact Petrenko
In exchange for rare artefacts, I can now upload new firmware to your PDA. Even a satellite channel. Lanky.
Heh-heh, even at my highest rates, the client is still desperate to do business with me!
Looking for a Stalker specialising in combination locks, with experience of raids to the north of the Zone.
I heard the Americans sent us a superhero. It'll be interesting to see him.
Do not go through the underground tunnels. They're full of mutants! Take the surface routes instead...
Hey, they've got a shishka pipe in the Bar. Better get there quick before it gets raided!
Everyone! Be careful staying in warehouses in the countryside. They're being burned down, and bodies piled up on posts!
Stalkers! Sakharov pays well for exclusive items from raids! He needs someone to go to X-16. It's a risky area, full of bloodsuckers and zombies

We need Stalkers for incursions into the Wild Territory. High rates of pay for good results. Kruglov.\nLabelled\nStalkers, if you want to keep your sanity, do not meet up with this Scientist. He's a nutcase!
Join our ranks of experienced trackers. No entrance fees. Zahar
Baldy\nGet a move on! If I see something coming I'll shoot...
We need Stalkers with expertise of deep raids into the Zone. Payment commensurate with skill and results. If interested, respond privately to discuss a meeting
Wolf, if you can talk safely, please come in...
Stalkers, join Duty! Defend the planet from the new plague that is upon us...
Spam\nMoskvin coffee - a really, truly, nasty Chinese-made coffee!
Spam\nLost - weapons. If found, please return them to me at the old Stardusk wreck in Backwater. Come alone!
Spam\nAntizombin - keeps the zombie in you at bay - even better than vodka!
Spam\nMoskvin relieves you of constipation in exactly 30 seconds. No more, no less...
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]We have a problem with the equipment. If it carries on like this, within a couple of days we could lose contact with the Base altogether...
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Stalkers - Join Duty! Help us to protect the world from the dangers of the Zone...

%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Switch to a private channel, then download the security updates.\nWe could have an entire network breach, just because you were too lazy to patch your PDA... Asshole!
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Information on the upcoming mutant raid, and other operations, available on a private channel. Downloading now...
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Stalkers - join Duty. Defend the planet from the infected Zone!
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Looking for experienced Stalkers to assist in eliminating a group of Snorks. Rewards will be commensurate with results...
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Looking for experienced Stalkers for a raid against mutants. Usual rates...
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Looking for experienced Stalkers for a raid on Freedom. See Voronin at the Duty base
%c[255,160,160,160]Petrenko\n%c[default]I was a rust repairer. A rust repairer and full-time survivor.\nAll the major earthquakes, a tsunami, and several air crashes... So stop telling me what to do!
%c[255,160,160,160]Voronin\n%c[default]It's far better to have a lion at the head of an army of sheep, than a sheep at the head of an army of lions...

%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]My life fades. The vision dims. All that remains are memories. I remember a time of chaos. Ruined dreams. This wasted land.
But most of all, I remember the Wish Granter, and the man we called Strelok.
To understand who he was, you have to go back to another time - when the world was powered by black energy...
%c[255,160,160,160]FREEDOM:\n%c[default]Long live Freedom! Let's make peace with the Zone, and make it a better place for everyone...
%c[255,160,160,160]FREEDOM:\n%c[default]Join Freedom! Together we'll make the Zone a better place!
%c[255,160,160,160]FREEDOM:\n%c[default]Looking for experienced Stalkers to join a hunt for rare artefacts... Fair prices offered!
%c[255,160,160,160]LUKASH:\n%c[default]Stalkers! Save Freedom! If you want to live a normal life in the Zone, without Duty oppression, then come join us!\nWe always welcome new blood

%c[255,160,160,160]LUKASH:\n%c[default]Attention Freedom! Immediately switch to a private channel, and update your PDA's with the latest protection patch. Then your transmissions won't be intercepted by Duty...
%c[255,160,160,160]FREEDOM:\n%c[default]If you're on a mission, switch to a private channel. Assume that there are people always listening...
